title: Salesforce | SMTS | Bengaluru
content:
Years of Experience: 8+
Date of the Offer: Sept,2024
Company: Salesforce
Title/Level: SMTS
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: 52 LPA
Stock bonus: $70K stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: 15% of Base Salary every year
Benefits: Standard Salesforce Benefits
Interview date: 2 weeks ago.

Can anyone suggest if there is some scope for negotiation?

title: Oracle | IC3(SSE) | HYD | Sept Offer
content:
Education: Tier-3
Years of Experience: 4 years
Current Experience: SE-2 at a PBC in HYD
Current salary: 19.5 LPA (16 LPA base , 2.5 LPA Bonus, 1 LPA Benefits) + ESOPS

Date of the Offer: September
Company: Oracle
Title/Level: IC3(SSE)
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: 26 LPA base , 1.5LPA retirals
Relocation/Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: NA

Advice needed: Should I accept the offered comp, or should I negotiate more?
